availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Franklin County, Kentucky, physician. Kentucky native. Married to Susan Rodman. Father of William Rodman, John Rodman, Anna Rodman, Pattie Rodman, and Hugh Rodman. Physician in Frankfort in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, Frankfort, District 1, p. 76.
Find A Grave, "Hugh Rodman (June 4, 1818-February 11, 1872)," Memorial #59882886, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/59882886 (accessed March 16, 2018).
